p: Methods: Single center prospective cohort study. Patients without AKI, admitted to a medical intensive care unit (ICU) between January 2010 and March 2013, were included. According to their ICU followup characteristics they were grouped as sepsis-non AKI, sepsis-AKI and non-sepsis-non AKI [control]. IGFBP-7 was studied with Human ELISA Kit/96 Test/USCNKÂ® from admission and daily collected serial urine samples.
